scripts.start: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && node prisma/startup.js && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.debug:documents: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/debug-documents.ts
scripts.generate-admin-token: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/generate-admin-token.ts
scripts.seed:embassy-sources: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/seed-embassy-sources.ts
scripts.coverage:report: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/visa-coverage-report.ts
scripts.embassy:sync: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/run-embassy-sync.ts
scripts.embassy:crawl: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/embassy-crawl.ts
scripts.visa:extract-rules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/visa-extract-rules.ts
scripts.approve:visarules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/approve-visarules.ts
scripts.approve:all-rulesets: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/approve-all-rulesets.ts
scripts.check:launch-readiness: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/check-launch-readiness.ts
scripts.eval:checklists: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/eval-checklists.ts
scripts.analyze:visas: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/analyze-supported-visas.ts
scripts.seed:us-b1b2-rules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/seed-us-b1b2-rules.ts
scripts.verify:us-b1b2-rules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/verify-us-b1b2-rules.ts
scripts.test:us-b1b2-checklist: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/test-us-b1b2-checklist.ts
scripts.seed:de-tourist-rules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/seed-de-tourist-rules.ts
scripts.verify:de-tourist-rules: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/verify-de-tourist-rules.ts
